Constructor Detail

Shot

public Shot(java.lang.String id,
            float strength,
            float rotation,
            float scale,
            org.newdawn.slick.geom.Vector2f position)
Constructor. Set all the mandatory properties, create a new shot entity, place it in front of the tank and check for collision with other objects. Shot is destroyed when it leaves the screen

Parameters:
id - The shots id
strength - The shots strength (how much it will subtract form the hit objects health
rotation - The shots rotation
scale - The shots scale
position - The shots initial position
